${ModID}:Rat.NAME: Rat
${ModID}:Rat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Rat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RattyStrike.NAME: Ratty Strike
${ModID}:RattyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! Rat into your hand.
${ModID}:RattyStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! Rats into your hand.

${ModID}:RatWall.NAME: Rat Wall
${ModID}:RatWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Rats into your hand.

${ModID}:RatSwarm.NAME: Rat Swarm
${ModID}:RatSwarm.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Rats to your hand. NL Whenever you play a *Rat this turn, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:OneTrickRat.NAME: One-Trick Rat
${ModID}:OneTrickRat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. If it is a *Rat, gain [E].

${ModID}:Cheese.NAME: Cheese!
${ModID}:Cheese.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Rat into your hand.
${ModID}:Cheese.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a *Rat into your hand.

${ModID}:RatGuard.NAME: Rat Guard
${ModID}:RatGuard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a *Rat, gain 3 Block. NL Add a *Rat into your hand.
${ModID}:RatGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a *Rat, gain 3 Block. NL Add a *Rat into your hand.

${ModID}:RatMilitia.NAME: Rat Militia
${ModID}:RatMilitia.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a *Rat, deal 3 damage to a random enemy. NL Add a *Rat into your hand.

${ModID}:Ratastrophe.NAME: Ratastrophe
${ModID}:Ratastrophe.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Fill your hand with *Rats. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Ratastrophe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fill your hand with *Rats. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:StrongTogether.NAME: Strong Together
${ModID}:StrongTogether.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a *Rat is created, gain !M! Temporary Strength.

${ModID}:RatKing.NAME: Rat King
${ModID}:RatKing.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL your *Rats. NL Deal !D! damage for each.
